PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Terence Mitchell BRUCE, Defendant-Appellee. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
Stanley Lyle Nicholson, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 156827
COA: 331232
SC: 156828
COA: 331233 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 18, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the motion for rehearing is considered, and it is DENIED.
